Repairs of vehicles review of a sample vehicles revealed that all the 13 vehicles (81%) of 16 vehicles selected for review were repaired. A total of 3 vehicles were found grounded and there were no plans in place to have them disposed of. Refer to the Table below for the vehicles that had been grounded.
